About Me

Hi, my name’s Jeevitha and I’m a Senior Salesforce Lightning Developer. A Polyglot Software Engineer with a penchant for Salesforce. I love coding and love to experiment with new technologies. I have worked at a number of companies gaining teamwork and leadership skills.

I am most skilled in: Salesforce, Mulesoft, Java and, JavaScript
